# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item boasts a wide range of features and benefits that are tailored to enhance your experience. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than $150 to you. Would you like to make this investment and enjoy all the advantages it offers? Let's discuss how we can make this happen. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
